abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Livestock Project is designed
            to develop livestock production by working through
            associations of pastoralists. The project will consist of
            the following six main components: (i) provision of
            livestock services to associations of pastoralists,
            including animal health, husbandry techniques, protection of
            rangelands and stock watering points; (ii) provision of
            credit for herd reconstitution and steer fattening; (iii)
            provision of equipment and materials for Livestock
            Department, SERARHY and Farcha Abattoir; (iv) assistance to
            a tsetse eradication program; (v) management training for
            Livestock Department senior staff; and (vi) preparation of a
            follow up project.
